description: The dataset consists of three years of salary data by employee reported by Industrial Development Agencies.  Public authorities are required by Section 2800 of Public Authorities Law to submit annual reports to the Authorities Budget Office (ABO) that include salary and compensation data.

name: Salary Information for Industrial Development Agencies
